get.description: Retrieves a list of all assignments, with optional filtering by course ID.

post.description: Creates a new assignment with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieves all student assignment records for a specific assignment.
get.summary: Get student assignments by assignment ID

get.description: Retrieves a single assignment by its unique identifier.

put.description: Updates an existing assignment identified by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes an assignment by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all quizzes, with optional filtering by course ID.

post.description: Creates a new quiz with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieves a single quiz by its unique identifier.

put.description: Updates an existing quiz identified by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a quiz by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves all questions for a specific quiz.
get.summary: Get quiz questions by quiz ID

post.description: Creates a new quiz question for a specific quiz.

get.description: Retrieves a single quiz question by its unique identifier.

put.description: Updates an existing quiz question identified by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a quiz question by its ID.

post.description: Records that a student has started a specific quiz.

get.description: Retrieves all student quiz records for a specific quiz.
get.summary: Get student quizzes by quiz ID

post.description: Records that a student has started a specific assignment.

get.description: Retrieves a specific student's assignment record by its unique identifier.

put.description: Updates an existing student's assignment record identified by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a student's assignment record by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a specific student's quiz record by its unique identifier.

put.description: Updates an existing student's quiz record identified by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a student's quiz record by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all quizzes for a specific student, including their progress.
Retrieves a list of all assignments for a specific student, including their progress.

ordinal.description: optional; if omitted, appended via trigger
